text:
Champions League
Real Madrid - Galatasaray: the world's press pays tribute to Rodrygo!
Author of a hat-trick and a decisive pass against Galatasaray (6-0), the Brazilian Rodrygo impressed during the fourth day of the Champions League.
07 Nov 2019, 15:20 by Charlie Creteur



At 18, Brazilian winger Real Madrid Rodrygo shone at home against Galatasaray (6-0) in the Champions League. Indeed, the native Osasco scored a hat-trick and delivered a decisive pass for Karim Benzema. The day after this service, the press from around the world paid tribute to him.




Rodrygo seen from the world press!




Rodrygo + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"Rodrygo has attracted attention with his spectacular hat-trick," reads the Daily Mail. For Globoesporte, Rodrygo "ordered the victory at Real Madrid". On the Argentine side, Ol√© sees the Auriverde as "a real promise". Finally, the Gazzetta dello Sport talks about "the night of Rodrygo". His next performances under the shirt of Casa Blanca will certainly be a little more monitored after that!
